about_the_game:
When witches go riding and pumpkins gleam, the moon laughs and whispers, ‘tis near Halloween! Enjoy our new Halloween DLC that brings you an exclusive pet as well as furniture, decoration pieces and building skins to spookify your farm.

New Pet
Happy Meowloween! Get a new friend: White Shadow - a ghostly kitten.

Interior decoration
Discover the most spooky furniture and decoration and turn your farmhouse into a mysterious Halloween castle. Get a ghostly seating area, spine-chilling decorations, antique window and floor designs as well as a new bed of which Dracula himself would be jealous.

Exterior Design
Spookified from the inside and the outside. Transform your farm house, the well and the windmill as well as the small and big animal barn with a sinister Halloween design! Give it the finishing touch with two new hair-rising exterior decorations.
